title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When a file, such as 'test.xml', is already open in the editor and we try to change its editor type by selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' from the context menu in the Navigator, nothing happens.
EB: When a file, such as 'test.xml', is already open in the editor and we try to change its editor type by selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' from the context menu in the Navigator, a new editor should open with the default text editor for the selected file.
SR:
1. Open the application and create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml' in the project.
3. The editor used for the file should be the 'scripted resource editor example', which ignores the XML file content.
4. In the Navigator, select the 'test.xml' file.
5. Right-click on the file and choose 'Open With...'.
6. From the dropdown menu, select 'Default Text Editor'.
7. Verify that a new editor is opened for the file, with the default text editor for XML files.
NOTES: Searching for an existing open file should also consider editor types.
